src:
Resep Mie Ayam Plus Ceker dan Jamur yang Enak ala Kaki Lima
04 Nov 2019, 03:00 by Lusiana Mustinda - detikFood


Resep mie ayam sederhana. Foto: istimewa

Jakarta - Mie ayam bisa dibuat sendiri di rumah. Potongan ayam dengan balutan bumbu gurih dan ceker bikin makin mantap. Yuk, bikin dengan resep mie ayam ini.Mie ayam sering diberi pelengkap berupa bakso, pangsit rebus, pangsit goreng, ceker, jamur dan juga daging ayam. Tak sulit membuat mie ayam enak di rumah. Yang kamu perlukan adalah membuat minyak ayam dan ayam bumbu kecapnya.



Baca juga: 
Puasnya Makan Mie Ayam Wajan Racikan Mbak Wati dari Bantul



Tertarik membuatnya? Berikut ini beberapa resep mie ayam enak yang bisa kamu ikuti:1. Resep Mie Ayam Sederhana


Resep mie ayam. Foto: detikFood

Bosan dengan sajian mie ayam yang manis? Kali ini kamu bisa meracik mie ayam sederhana versi yamien. Berikut langkah pembuatannya:Bahan:- 500 g mie telur segar- 2 sdm kecap manis- 1 sdm minyak sayur- 1 sdm bawang putih goreng, remas halus- 1/2 sdt minyak wijenTopping:- 1 sdm minyak sayur- 1 siung bawang putih, cincang halus- 1 sdm daun bawang, iris kasar- 150 gram fillet ayam, potong dadu kecil- 1 sdm kecap asin- 1 sdm saus tiram- 1 sdm kecap manis- 1/2 sdt merica bubuk- 1 sdt garamPelengkap:- 2 batang sawi, potong-potong, rebus- 300 ml kaldu ayam- 2 sdm bawang merah gorengCara membuat:- Pilihlah mie segar yang bagus kualitasnya. Lepaskan dari bungkusnya dan tekan-tekan hingga terurai.- Didihkan air secukupnya dalam panci.- Rebus mie sebentar hingga lunak lalu tiriskan segera.- Aduk kecap, minyak, bawang putih goreng dan minyak wijen hingga rata.- Masukkan mie panas ke dalam campuran kecap.- Aduk-aduk hingga tercampur rata. Sisihkan.Cara membuat topping:- Tumis bawang putih dan daun bawang hingga layu.-Masukkan potongan ayam, aduk hingga kaku.- Masukkan kecap asin dan bumbu lainnya.- Aduk hingga mendidih dan ayam jadi kaku. Angkat.- Taruh mie dalam mamgkuk saji.- Beri Topping dan Pelengkapnya.- Sajikan hangat.2. Resep Mie Ayam Ceker


Resep mie ayam ceker. Foto: Instagram

Hampir dengan resep mie ayam biasa, hanya saja tidak hanya daging ayam yang dicampurkan tetapi juga ceker ayam.Bahan:- 250 gr ceker ayam- 250 gram dada ayam rebus, potong kecil- 3 sdm kecap manis- 1 batang serai- 2 lembar daun salam- 2 lembar daun jeruk- 1 ikat sawi hijau- Daun bawang iris secukupnya- Gula, garam dan kaldu bubuk secukupnya- Mie telur secukupnyaBumbu halus:- 5 siung bawang merah- 3 siung bawang putih- 4 butir kemiri sangrai- 2 cm kunyit- 1 cm jahe- 1 sdt ketumbar sangrai- Merica secukupnyaCara membuat:- Tumis bumbu halus, serai, daun jeruk dan daun salam hingga harum dan matang. Tambahkan kecap manis.- Masukkan ceker ayam dan tambahkan air secukupnya dan masak sampai matang.- Masukkan potongan daging ayam dan irisan daun bawang. Masak dengan api kecil hingga bumbu meresap, sisihkan.- Rebus mie telur dan sawi, taruh di mangkuk.- Tambahkan beberapa topping seperti ayam dan ceker dan siram dengan sedikit kuah.- Sajikan dengan sambal3. Resep Mie Ayam Bangka


Resep mie ayam bangka. Foto: Instagram

Resep mie ayam enak ini patut kamu coba di rumah. Mienya lembut dengan topping ayam berbumbu kecap yang gurih. Hmm, enak!Bahan:- 500 gr mi telur segar/basah- 1 sdm minyak sayur- 1 sdm kecap asinTopping:- 2 sdm minyak sayur- 2 siung bawang putih, cincang halus- 250 gr daging ayam, potong kecil- 150 gr jamur merah, potong-potong- 2 sdm saus tiram- 1 sdm kecap asin- 1 sdm kecap manis- ½ sdt merica bubuk- 1 sdt garam- 200 ml airKuah:- 500 ml kaldu ayam- siung bawang putih cincang- 1 sdm daun bawang- ½ sdt merica bubuk- 1 sdt garamPelengkap:- 4 batang sawi, potong-potong, rebus- 100 g tauge, bersihkan- 2 sdm bawang merah gorengCara membuat:- Didihkan air, masukkan mi sebentar dalam air lalu tiriskan segera.- Aduk minyak dan kecap hingga rata.- Masukkan mie, aduk rata. Sisihkan.Topping:- Tumis bawang putih hingga wangi.- Masukkan potongan ayam, aduk hingga berubah warna dan kaku.- Tambahkan jamur, aduk hingga layu- Masukkan saus tiram, kecap manis, kecap asin, merica dan garam. Aduk hingga tercampur rata.- Tuangi air, didihkan sebentar hingga kuah habis. Angkat.Kuah: Rebus kaldu, bawang putih, daun bawang, merica dan garam hingga mendidih lalu angkat.Penyajian:Taruh mi di dalam mangkuk.Beri Toppingnya lalu tambahkan sawi, tauge dan daun bawang.Sajikan dengan Kuahnya.Selamat mencoba resep mie ayam enaknya!

Begini Cara Ribet Bikin Mie Instan Gaya Restoran

text:
Recipe Chicken Noodle Plus Ceker and Tasty Mushrooms ala Street Vendor
Nov 04 2019, 03:00 by Lusiana Mustinda - detikFood


Simple chicken noodle recipe. Photo: special

Jakarta - Chicken noodles can be made at home. Pieces of chicken wrapped in savory seasonings and claws make it even more solid. Come on, make with this chicken noodle recipe. Chicken pie is often given complement in the form of meatballs, boiled dumplings, fried dumplings, claws, mushrooms and also chicken meat. It's not hard to make delicious chicken noodles at home. What you need is to make chicken oil and soy sauce seasoning chicken.



Also read:
Satisfied Eating Chicken Noodle Wajan Racikan Mbak Wati from Bantul



Interested in making it? Here are some delicious chicken noodle recipes that you can follow: 1. Simple Chicken Noodle Recipe


Chicken noodle recipe. Photo: detikFood

Bored with serving sweet chicken noodles? This time you can mix the yamien version of simple chicken noodles. The following steps are made: Ingredients: - 500 g of fresh egg noodles - 2 tablespoons of soy sauce - 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil - 1 tablespoon of fried garlic, soft squeeze- 1/2 teaspoon sesame oilTopping: - 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil - 1 clove of garlic, finely chopped- 1 tablespoon scallions, roughly sliced- 150 grams of chicken fillet, cut into small cubes- 1 tablespoon soy sauce- 1 tablespoon oyster sauce- 1 tablespoon sweet soy sauce- 1/2 tsp ground pepper- 1 tsp salt , cut into pieces, boil 300 ml of chicken stock - 2 tablespoons fried shallots How to make: - Choose fresh, good quality noodles. Remove from the wrapper and press until it decomposes.- Bring enough water to boil in the pan.- Boil the noodles for a while until soft and drain immediately.- Stir soy sauce, oil, fried garlic and sesame oil until smooth.- Put hot noodles in soy sauce mixture .- Stir until evenly mixed. Set aside. How to make toppings: - Saute garlic and leeks until wilted. - Insert the chicken pieces, stir until stiff. - Add soy sauce and other seasonings. Lift. - Put noodles in a serving. - Give toppings and additives. - Serve warm. Chicken Ceker Noodle Recipe


Chicken feet noodle recipe. Photo: Instagram

Almost with ordinary chicken noodle recipe, it's just not only chicken meat that is mixed but also chicken feet. Ingredients: - 250 gr chicken feet - 250 grams of boiled chicken breast, cut into small pieces - 3 tablespoons sweet soy sauce - 1 lemongrass stems - 2 bay leaves - 2 pieces of orange leaves - 1 bunch of mustard greens - Onion sliced to taste - Sugar, salt and broth to taste - Egg noodles to taste Smooth spices: - 5 cloves of shallots - 3 cloves of garlic - 4 grains of candied turkey - 2 cm turmeric - 1 cm ginger- 1 teaspoon coriander roasted- Pepper to taste How to make: - Saute ground spices, lemongrass, orange leaves and bay leaves until fragrant and cooked. Add sweet soy sauce. Add chicken feet and add enough water and cook until cooked. Add chicken pieces and sliced scallions. Cook on low heat until the spices are absorbed, set aside.- Boil egg noodles and mustard greens, put in a bowl.- Add some toppings such as chicken and claw and flush with a little sauce.- Serve with chili sauce. Chicken Bangka Noodle Recipe


Bangka chicken noodle recipe. Photo: Instagram

This delicious chicken noodle recipe should be tried at home. The noodles are tender with a savory soy sauce-seasoned chicken topping. Hmm, delicious! Ingredients: - 500 grams of fresh / wet egg noodles - 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil - 1 tablespoon soy sauceTopping: - 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil - 2 cloves of garlic, finely chopped- 250 grams of chicken meat, small pieces-150 grams of mushrooms red, cut into pieces - 2 tablespoons of oyster sauce - 1 tablespoon soy sauce - 1 tablespoon sweet soy sauce - ½ teaspoon pepper powder - 1 teaspoon salt - 200 ml of waterFruits: - 500 ml chicken broth - minced garlic cloves - 1 tablespoon leek- ½ teaspoon pepper powder - 1 teaspoon salt Complete: - 4 sticks of mustard greens, chopped, boiled - 100 g of bean sprouts, clean - 2 tablespoons of fried shallots How to make: - Boil water, add noodles in water and drain immediately.- Stir oil and stir ketchup until smooth. - Put in the noodles, stir well. Set aside.Topping: - Saute garlic until fragrant.- Add chicken pieces, stir until it changes color and stiffness.- Add mushrooms, stir until wilt- Add oyster sauce, sweet soy sauce, soy sauce, pepper and salt. Stir until evenly mixed.- Pour water, boil briefly until the sauce runs out. Lift. Sauce: Boil broth, garlic, leeks, pepper and salt until boiling then remove. Serving: Put the noodles in a bowl. Give the topping then add the mustard, bean sprouts and scallions. Serve with the broth. Welcome to try the delicious chicken noodle recipe. !
